Module project.notizprogrammrepository
Package project.notizprogrammrepository.view.Note.Collections

Class CollectionView

java.lang.Object
project.notizprogrammrepository.view.Note.Collections.CollectionView
public class CollectionView extends Object
A view component representing an editor for a NoteCollection.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final javafx.scene.control.Button
    cancelButton
    A button used to discard all changes and close the editor.
    private final Controller
    controller
    The Controller used for access to the data.
    private final javafx.scene.Group
    root
    The root Group of the component containing all other elements.
    private final javafx.scene.control.Button
    saveButton
    A button used to save all changes and close the editor.
    private final javafx.scene.control.TextArea
    textArea
    A TextArea used for displaying and editing the collection's text.
    private final javafx.scene.control.Label
    title
    A label for the title of the collection.

    • CollectionView

      public CollectionView(double x, double y, double width, double height, Controller controller, CollectionSegmentView collectionSegmentView)
      Creates a new CollectionView of the given size at the given position.
      Parameters:
      x - The x position of the component.
      y - The y position of the component.
      width - The width of the component.
      height - The height of the component.
      controller - The Controller used for access to the data.
      collectionSegmentView - The SegmentView that the CollectionView is a part of.

  • Method Details

    • resize

      public void resize(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Changes the size and position of all components respective to the given values.
      Parameters:
      x - The new x position of the component.
      y - The new y position of the component.
      width - The new width of the component.
      height - The new height of the component.

    • display

      public void display(String collectionTitle)
      Sets the values of the components to the values of the collection corresponding to the given title and displays the component.
      Parameters:
      collectionTitle - The title of the collection to be displayed.
